# Fragment Normalization Test

URLs with fragments (#section) should be normalized for deduplication.

## Section Linking

The specification [1] defines the core concepts, particularly the data model [2].
We also reference the API section [3] and the examples [4].

## Implementation Notes

Following the specification [1], we implement the data model [2] with
attention to the API details [3] and practical examples [4].

## Cross-References

The core specification [1] is essential, along with the data model [2],
API reference [3], and examples [4].

[1]: https://example.com/spec#overview
[2]: https://example.com/spec#data-model
[3]: https://example.com/spec#api
[4]: https://example.com/spec#examples
